item.title: Hugo Colour Shortcode
item.description:
Names of colours don’t convey their image very well. What does #714825 looks like? I wrote a shortcode that shows previews of colours in Hugo, so you can see them and don’t have to imagine them.

Read more

item.title: ...and Back to Hugo Again
item.description:
I switched to Nuxt not more than 2 months ago. Now, I am back to using Hugo, and intend to do so for the forseeable future.

Read more

item.title: Moving my site from Hugo to Nuxt.js...
item.description:
I previously built my site using Hugo with the Academic theme. It felt restrictive, so I tried out various static site generators and chose Nuxt.js.

Read more
